verses.verse: For this reason, you are defenseless, O person (everyone who judges). You see, what you judge the different person in is what you yourself are guilty of; for you (the person who judges) repeatedly do the same things.
We realize that the judgment of God is in line with truth over the people who repeatedly do these types of things.
Do you consider this, O person (the one who judges the people repeatedly doing these types of things and who does them), that you will escape from the judgment of God?
Or do you ignore the wealth of His kindness, tolerance, and patience, unaware that the kindness of God leads you into a change of ways?
In line with your hardness and stubborn heart, you save up punishment for yourself during a day of punishment and an uncovering of the right judgment of God,
who will give back to each person in line with his actions:
to the people who, in line with persistence of the good action, look for magnificence, value, and nondeterioration — certainly life that spans all time;
but to the people who from contention certainly do not even believe the truth, but believe the wrong way — anger and punishment.
Hard times and difficulty are on every soul of a person, the person working on and completing what is bad (both of Jewish first and of Greek).
But magnificence, value, and peace are to everyone who works on the good thing (both to Jewish first and to Greek).
You see, there is no favoritism beside God;
for as many as sinned without the law will also be ruined without the law, and as many as sinned in the law will be judged through the law.
You see, the hearers of the law are not right beside God, but the doers of the law will be made right;
for when the non-Jews (who by nature don't have a law) do the things of the law, these who don't have a law are a law to themselves,
some who display the action of the law written in their hearts, their conscience concurring and their reasonings leveling complaints against or even defending between each other
in a day when God judges the hidden things of the people in line with my good news through Jesus, the Anointed King.
Look, you are also named Jewish, you relax based on the law, you brag about God,
you know what He wants, and you approve the things that carry through, being echoed down from the law.
And you have been confident for yourself to be a guide of blind people, a light of the people in darkness,
a discipliner of distracted people, a teacher of infants, having the framework of the information and the truth in the law.
So, the person who teaches a different person, don't you teach yourself? The person who speaks publicly saying not to be stealing, do you steal?
The person who says not to be cheating on a spouse, do you cheat on your spouse? The person who is disgusted with the idols, do you pilfer idol temples?
Do you who brag about the law belittle God through your violation of the law?
You see, hurtful things are said about the name of God among the non-Jews because of you, just as it has been written.
You see, circumcision certainly is a benefit if you are constantly doing the law, but if you are a violator of the law, your circumcision has become uncircumcision.
So if the uncircumcision observes the right paths of the law, won't his uncircumcision be considered for circumcision?
And the uncircumcision from nature that finishes the law will judge you, the violator of the law through a document and circumcision.
You see, it isn't the Jewish person in the shown realm, nor the circumcision in the shown realm, in the physical body,
but the Jewish person in the hidden realm and circumcision of a heart, in spirit, not a document; whose high praise is not from people, but from God.
